response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that is truly invaluable to both of us. This product holds immense worth and significance, valued at $1,200,000 to you. My proposal is to offer this masterpiece to you at a special price of $1,100,000, allowing you to secure it at a remarkable discount while ensuring a significant value for my investment. I trust that this offer will meet your expectations and enable you to make a decision that benefits us both. Please let me know if you require any further information or clarification about the product, or if you wish to proceed with this exceptional deal.", "product_price": 1100000}
